ActCanada Shipping Act, 2001
SubjectFire and Boat Drills Regulations
PrecisFIRE AND BOAT DRILLS REGULATIONS to enhance safety in commercial navigation. The new provisions increase the likelihood of rescuing all persons in an emergency situation, as an accurate count of persons on board the vessel will be available to search and rescue services. The modifications also relieve industry stakeholders from requirements that cannot be realistically fulfilled.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0083 Publication Date: 2010-05-12
